mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, s_no, mem_id, s_sj, s_ct, s_fl, s_rc, s_dt, s_lk, S_lkno ,scomm_cnt from (select * from sboardlist order by s_dt desc) ) where rnum < 6

select rownum, grnum, gbbs_userid, gbbs_author, gbbs_num,gbbs_mem_no,gbbs_subject,gbbs_content,gbbs_readcount,gbbs_date,gbbs_like,gbbs_likeno,gbbs_file,gbbs_comm from (select rownum grnum, m.mem_id gbbs_userid, m.mem_nm gbbs_author, g.g_no gbbs_num, g.mem_no gbbs_mem_no, g.g_sj gbbs_subject, g.g_ct gbbs_content, g.g_rc gbbs_readcount, g.g_dt gbbs_date, g.g_lk gbbs_like, g.g_lkno gbbs_likeno, g.g_fl gbbs_file, g.GCOMM_CNT gbbs_comm from member m, glist g where g.mem_no=m.mem_no order by g.g_no desc ) where grnum < 6
select * from (select rownum rnum, mem_id,mem_no, o_no, o_sj, o_ct, o_fl, o_rc, o_dt, o_lk, o_lkno from oboard order by o_no desc) where rnum < 6
select * from (select rownum rnum, f_no,mem_id,f_sj, f_ct,f_fl,f_rc,f_dt,f_lk,f_lkno from (select * from fboardlist order by f_no desc, f_rc asc) ) where rnum < 6
select * from (select rownum rnum, e_no, mem_no, e_sj, e_ct, e_rc, e_dt, e_lk, e_lkno, e_fl from (select * from eboard order by e_no desc) ) where rnum < 6
